alert.note: Alert for Allen (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 4:27PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Allen County through 400 PM CDT... At 326 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Scottsville, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Allen County, including the following locations... Fleet, Rodemer, Adolphus, Petroleum, Alonzo, Chapel Hill, Forest Springs and Amos. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
